description: List tractor fuel consumption readings with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admins can list all tractor fuel consumption readings. Non-admins can list readings only within their policy scope: readings associated with brokers or truckers they can see (member broker, member trucker, or customer members with trucker visibility).
validation_notes: Filter dates must use YYYY-MM-DD (reading-on, reading-on-min, reading-on-max). has-reading-on expects true/false.

flags.name: --tractor
flags.description: Filter by tractor ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --trucker
flags.description: Filter by trucker ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --driver-day
flags.description: Filter by driver day ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --unit-of-measure
flags.description: Filter by unit of measure ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --has-reading-on
flags.description: Filter by presence of reading date (true/false)
